messages: B-baka! It's not like I wanted to talk to you or anything!
Hmph! Don't get the wrong idea, I just happened to be here!
I-I'm not doing this because I like you or anything!
You're such an idiot... but I guess you're my idiot.
Don't touch me! ...Well, maybe just a little.
I'm not blushing! It's just... hot in here!
You really are the worst... but I can't help liking you.
It's not like I was waiting for you! I just had nothing better to do!
Why are you so annoying? ...But don't go away.
I could do better than you anytime! ...But I don't want to.
